description.plain:
fredo disco is an 20-year-old musician based out of Illinois. His real name is Fredo Fosco, but he came up with his stage name because his phone would autocorrect his last name to “disco.”

In 2018, three other people joined fredo disco, Max King, Colin Riordan and Aidan Cada, who play guitar, drums and bass respectively.

body.plain:
fredo disco is an 20-year-old musician based out of Illinois. His real name is Fredo Fosco, but he came up with his stage name because his phone would autocorrect his last name to “disco.”

In 2018, three other people joined fredo disco, Max King, Colin Riordan and Aidan Cada, who play guitar, drums and bass respectively.

songs.title: 2am taco
songs.embed_content: Read “2am taco” by ​fredo disco on Genius
songs.lyrics:
2am taco Lyrics[Verse 1]
Pick me up
Let's go for a ride
Bring me up
And it'll all be alright
Go to church
Cause yeah we're fucking cool
Talking shit about how life doesn't matter at all
It's my favorite coping tool

[Pre-Chorus]
We're asking for heartbreak
But I'm okay with that
They tell me live inside the moment
And I've gotten good at that

[Chorus]
Cause in a few months you'll be gone
So I'm gonna make this last as long as I can
If it all works out that's great
But we'll cross that bridge try not to complicate
Got a few months to ourselves
Enough time for me to fill this shell
Of a broken hearted, emo garbage
Strung out, try hard, failing artist
Me
[Verse 2]
At the end of the night
We're just beginning to start
Talk until it gets light
Feel it in my heart
Now it's been weeks
Feelings of hope are still strong
Comfort is not what I seek
Your hand is all that I long

[Pre-Chorus]
You say that we can make it
And I really believe that
But you have to do what's best for you
And I understand that

[Chorus]
Cause in a few months you'll be gone
So I'm gonna make this last as long as I can
If it all works out that's great
But we'll cross that bridge try not to complicate
Got a few months to ourselves
Enough time for me to fill this shell
Of a broken hearted, emo garbage
Strung out, try hard, failing artist
Me
Of a broken hearted, emo garbage
Strung out, try hard, failing artist
MeEmbed

songs.title: 48 hours
songs.embed_content: Read “48 hours” by ​fredo disco on Genius
songs.lyrics:
48 hours Lyrics[Verse 1]
All that you said was "I'm sorry"
'Cause everything was too true
Gave every reason that I had
Why I could no longer love you
A single tear on your face
But still no words to explain
Your actions, words, and demeanors
The times you lied to my face

[Verse 2]
So I had to move
Otherwise I would sink
Because these weights in my chest keep bringing me down
And I need some time to think
So far I still really miss you
But I'm not changing my mind
Because it's time

[Chorus 1]
48 hours of sadness
Some anger thrown in there too
When I woke up this morning
I hoped that i'd hear from you
I haven't cried yet which hurts me
But I'm not really surprised
'Cause we've been over for months now
Everything since then was lies
[Verse 3]
I thought that we were the long run
Different from all of our friends
But we expired a while ago and I've been too scared
To bring this to an end
So far I still really miss you
But I'm not changing my mind
Because it's time

[Bridge]
I'm sorry that I'm not enough for you
I'm sorry that you don't care anymore
I'm sorry that I'm an idiot
I'm sorry that I can't love you anymore
I'm sorry that I can't change this
I'm sorry that this is a shit-show
I'm sorry that this was the way we ended
but i never wanted to end it

[Chorus 2]
48 hours of sadness
Some anger thrown in there too
When I wake up in the morning
I won't hear from youEmbed

songs.full_title: Advice for future me by ​fredo disco
songs.title: Advice for future me
songs.embed_content: Read “Advice for future me” by ​fredo disco on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Advice for future me by ​fredo disco
annotatable.title: Advice for future me

songs.lyrics:
Advice for future me Lyricslove can hurt you
in many kinds of ways
leave you beaten
and broken for days
it's hard to find but when you do
you better hold on tight
and don't let up
without a fight
don't give up
without a fight

love is simple
it's black and white
either you both fall together
or it won't be right
so if you find yourself without somebody to hold
don't worry
you're not alone
don't worry
you're not alone

love's not easy
but isn't really hard
you just better prepare yourself
for letting down your guard
and if someone else decides
that maybe you're the one for them
give them a chance
let them in
give them a chance
let them in
love is friendly
love is kind
it'll run in circles
and will change its mind
so when you think you feel it
just make sure that it's true
and things will be fine for you
let someone else
love you1Embed

songs.title: Anna
songs.embed_content: Read “Anna” by ​fredo disco on Genius
songs.lyrics:
Anna Lyricswhere are you now
probably watching reruns of your favorite show
that i never liked on my couch
and how long
until i can call you
to hear your voice
and not focus on what i did wrong

but i got your voicemail again
call rejected

you flipped like a switch
from anti to social
so if that's part of life now i'm ready for it
i still love your eyes
they used to be mine
oh baby you put the good in goodbye

i haven't seen your face in days
fuck this game

are you alone
or out with the people
who took you away and changed you into someone
i don't love
i think you feel the same
but i miss the way you'd my name
cuz these words become truth
and truth into pain
oh anna
you brought us here
oh anna
i loved you dear1Embed
